Posts.Content: Hi Bev,  it did go well indeed!  It was found to be a cyst and I'm sched for an aspiration on Monday, they said if it does not drain then they will have to do a biopsy.  But I'm sure it will drain.  Thanks
Posts.Title: hard lump in left breast

Posts.Content: Hi all, i've been reading everyones post and wanted to share my story and hopefully get some insite.  On this past Thursday, I was watching tv and turned slightly on my right side and my left arm lightly fell onto my left breast.  I felt a sharp pain, kinda soreness, that comes and goes still until today. So I checked my breast and to my surprise (not pleasant) felt a large hard lump that I had never experienced before.  Just so happened I had a follow up dr appt for an unrelated reason on Friday morning, she did a breast exam and said it may just be a cyst and asked when was my cycle going to start, well I don't have a cycle anymore due to a rollerball procedure I had in May of last year due to cysts.
Posts.Title: hard lump in left breast

Posts.Content: Well, unfortunately it did not drain.  They did biopsy and thank God it was NEGATIVE!!!
Posts.Title: hard lump in left breast
